discord.promotesystem.cmd.promote.add.no.message: You need to provide a short biography or use the keyword 'none' (!promote add none).

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promote.del.su.message: You ($1) will no longer be promoted

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promote.nochan.message: Ask an admin to set a promote channel with !promote channel and/or !promote streamchannel

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promote.noself.message: No one is allowed to manage themselves, please speak to a moderator to be added or deleted.

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promote.revoke.message: You are no longer allowed to add yourself.

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promote.usage.message: !promote add [short bio] | delete - Add or delete yourself from being promoted.

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promoteadm.add.message: You need to provide a short biography or use the keyword 'none' (!promoteadm add user none).
Who do you wish to promote?

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promoteadm.all.message: 'Allow which user to be able to add themselves again?
$1  will be allowed to add themselves again.

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promoteadm.cha.message: Use which channel for promotions? To remove current channel use !promoteadm channel clear
Promote channel has been set to: $1

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promoteadm.del.message: Who you wish to remove from being promoted?

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promoteadm.lis.message: No users are presently being promoted.

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promoteadm.noa.message: That account does not appear to exist in Twitch: $1

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promoteadm.noc.message: Set channels with !promoteadm channel and/or !promoteadm streamchannel

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promoteadm.rev.message: Revoke the privilege of which user to be able to add themselves?
$1 will no longer be promoted and will no longer be able to manage themselves.

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promoteadm.set.message: The interval for promoting streamers has been set to $1 minutes.
The interval should be 15 minutes or more as to not spam the channel.

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promoteadm.str.message: Stream announcement channel has been cleared.
Use which channel for stream announcements? To remove current channel use !promoteadm streamchannel clear
Stream announcement channel has been set to: $1

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promoteadm.tog.message: Banners will no longer show when a stream is announced.
Banners will now show when a stream is announced.
Users will no longer be able to manage themselves via !promote add and delete.
Users will now be able to manage themselves via !promote add and delete.
Stats will no longer show when a stream is announced.
Stats will now show when a stream is announced.

discord.promotesystem.cmd.promoteadm.usa.message: !promoteadm add | delete | so | channel | streamchannel | revoke | allow | toggleselfmanage | togglestats | togglebanner | list | setinterval

discord.promotesystem.cmd.so.noexist.message: That user is not currently being promoted. Check !promoteadm list

discord.promotesystem.cmd.so.nouser.message: You must provide a user to lookup and shoutout.

discord.promotesystem.promotemsg.descrip.message: Be sure to follow and checkout $1
